price: 27. "So Allâh has been gracious to us, and has saved us from the torment of the Fire.
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
